edm:aggregatedCHO.schema:text: A Plan of the City and the Country about Trichinapoly [...] / To his Royal Highness William Duke of Cumberland Captain General of his Majestic Forces / This plan is most humbly inscribed by his most obedient servant John Rocque chorographer of his Royal Highness the Prince of Wales.
edm:aggregatedCHO.dc:title: Kaart van Trichinapoly en omgeving
edm:aggregatedCHO.dc:description:
Titel catalogus Leupe (NA): A Plan of the City and the Country about Trichinapoly, with the encampments of the English and French Army; that of the English commanded by colonel Stringer Lawrence, in the years 1753 and 1754.
Notities verso: No. 8 Stad en Environs van Trichinapolij. Register 1, Deel 1, Folio .., Portefeuille 1 [geschreven op een blauw etiket] / 588 [met vette cijfers gestempeld op een etiketje].
dc:subject: plattegrond / kaart
kampement / legerplaats
banderol / cartouche / versiering
legenda
